DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Connectivity Basic
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation: Connection information between two as a logical connection without providing the connection feature, the connection type, or realizing elements (fasteners, etc.) for the connection.

DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Connectivity Path
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation: Connection information between two with an optional connection geometry describing the connection feature as end caps (to trim the element's footprint profile at the connection ends).

DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Connectivity Realized
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation: Connection information between two elements or between an element and another element as a connection including the link the realizing elements (fasteners, etc.) that establish this connection physically.

DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Connectivity Is Realization
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation: The element is used within a connectivity relationship, represented by IfcRelConnectsWithRealizingElement, as one of the RealizingElements.
